en.title: Causes and Solutions for Cat Spraying (Marking) Behavior
en.content:
Cat spraying is a marking behavior in which cats spray urine on walls and furniture. The strong odor makes it a major issue for indoor cats.

Causes

The main causes are territorial assertion, being in heat, stress, and anxiety. It is most common in unneutered males, but females may also spray.

The Most Effective Solution

Neutering or spaying is the most effective measure. Approximately 90% of unneutered male cats stop spraying after surgery. However, if the behavior has become a long-established habit, it may continue even after surgery, so early neutering is recommended.

Other Measures

Eliminating sources of stress, using pheromone products, and improving the litter box environment can also be effective. Thoroughly clean sprayed areas with an enzyme-based cleaner to remove the scent.

zh.title: 猫咪喷尿（标记行为）的原因与对策
zh.content:
猫咪的喷尿行为是指猫在墙壁和家具上喷洒尿液的标记行为。气味强烈，对于室内饲养来说是一个很大的问题。

原因

主要原因包括领地宣示、发情、压力和不安。未绝育的公猫最为常见，但母猫也可能出现这种行为。

最有效的对策

绝育手术是最有效的方法。约90%的未绝育公猫在手术后会停止喷尿行为。但如果行为已经长期固化，手术后可能仍会持续，因此建议尽早进行绝育手术。

其他对策

消除压力来源、使用费洛蒙产品、改善猫砂盆环境等也很有效。喷尿过的地方请使用酶类清洁剂彻底去除气味。
